docna.cdata!:
Tanzania - Port Rehabilitation Project :
            Credit 1536 - Project Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Tanzania - Port Rehabilitation
            Project : Credit 1536 - Project Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
Tanzania - Port Rehabilitation Project :
            Credit 1536 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Tanzania - Port Rehabilitation
            Project : Credit 1536 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The Port Rehabilitation Project is
            designed to provide for the rehabilitation and modernization
            of the Port of Dar es Salaam. This is Tanzania's major
            port which also serves as an important regional port for
            several neighboring countries (Burundi, Malawi, Rwanda,
            Zaire, Zambia). The proposed project will provide special
            container handling facilities and equipment, replace some
            deteriorated general cargo equipment, modernize grain
            handling facilities, and rehabilitate lighterage facilities
            and the petroleum jetty. The project will also repave
            sections of berths, and provide for a review of additional
            rehabilitation requirements, technical assistance and
            training, and consultancy services.
